creator: dev@tomcat.apache.org
text:
An exception was raised in doInit() call. If the exception
is thrown and it is not an UnavailableException, the unavailable is casted to be an Exception. Later in service() call, the unavailable is casted to UnavailableException
which case cast exception.

The only place where I can find where "unavailable" is casted to
an UnavailableException (in ServletWrapper.java) is the servletAvailable()
method following an "instanceof UnavailableException" test.  I can't match the
bug description to the source in any Tomcat 3.x source.  Please re-submit the
bug with additional detail if the problem still exists.
creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
